This guide will help developers to succeed their projects with eXo platform. Will be introduced to eXo architecture and walked through the steps to make your own custom projects with it.

_Target audience_: Developers that need to build a custom portal based on eXo Platform

{note}This document is not a full reference, it's a guide to most common tasks developers need to face when working with eXo.
The full reference is available in the delivery package and is linked rather than replicated here.{note}
